name: Uncontrolled Harvest
description:
You own a farm that growns uncontrollably. 

You have 10 seconds each day to collect flowers by walking over them (WASD) and you can also cut bushes by clicking on them. Flowers are worth 3 bucks and bushes 1 dollar but each cut cuts your day by 1 second.

After 10 days you farming life is over. Enjoy lol!

@ShotgunAnaconda on twitter
